proposalTitle: Enable Google Search grounding for free tier

dissenters.name: Warren Buffett
dissenters.reason: Unsustainable cost at free tier. Would burn $500+/mo with no revenue. Wait for Pro tier.

dissenters.name: Charlie Munger
dissenters.reason: Inversion: What kills us? Unlimited API costs. Don't open Pandora's box.

dissenters.name: Bruce Schneier
dissenters.reason: Security concern: Free tier has no rate limiting on grounding. Risk of abuse.

approvers.name: Andrew Chen
approvers.reason: Viral loop potential if users can share grounded results.

finalDecision: Rejected. Grounding limited to Pro tier minimum. Revisit after 3 months.

actionItems.task: Implement grounding for Pro tier only
Revisit free tier grounding after cost data available

lessonsLearned: Always run unit economics before proposing free tier features.
